channel.title: Markdown on markkerry.github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Markdown on markkerry.github.io

item.title: Markdown Reference
item.description: If you scroll to the bottom of any page of this site, you will notice the words “Powered by Hugo”, and all posts generated in a Hugo static web app are written in markdown. Having owned a Github account for a few years now, I have some experience writing docs in markdown, but at times have to resort to looking up Markdown style guides. Here is my quick reference for writing in Markdown.
